column2:
"That ARKS Code is full of a lot of confusing
wordiness, but what it's really trying to say is this."

"If you deliver the goods, you can raise the
limit on your abilities."

"That's all there is to it, really.
There's nothing else.
It's all up to you."

"Whether or not you take this test is completely
up to you. My job is merely to evaluate your
performance."
